attributes.action: Petition for farmer to keep his secret castle built on his own land againts planning permision
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People should have the right to build whatever they want on their own land, it should not be upto the council to decide what they can and can't build, as long as it is within the restriction of their own land then what's the problem!

reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
